index.slogan:
Your Ultimate

Manager of Images in S3 Buckets
index.description: Upload, view and delete images in your S3 bucket with ease
index.compatibility: Also works with lots of S3-compatible services

keyTemplate.title: Key template
keyTemplate.description: Template for the S3 key. Learn more at <more>docs</more>, including the available placeholders.
keyTemplate.deprecatedPlaceholderWarning: placeholder {placeholder} has been deprecated, use {instead} instead
keyTemplate.defaultKeyTemplateDesc: The default template used when uploading files. You can override this template when performing uploads.

imageCompress.title: Image convertion and compression
imageCompress.description: Convert or compress your image before uploading them.
imageCompress.enableDesc: If turned off, images will be uploaded to S3 as is.
imageCompress.qualityDesc: Quality for the compressed image, integer from 1 to 100.

s3Settings.title: S3
s3Settings.pathStyleDesc: Force using the deprecated <more>path style API</more>.
s3Settings.publicUrlDesc: The access url for the public bucket. <mono>public-url/object-path</mono> should be able to access the object in bucket. Learn more at <more>docs</more>.
s3Settings.includePathDesc: Optional path prefix to filter objects (e.g., "i/" to only list objects starting with "i/"). Leave empty to list all objects.

messages.connectionFailed: Unable to connect to your S3 bucket. Please check:
messages.settingsCorrect: Your S3 settings are correct and working!
messages.corsPermissionsNeeded: You just need to add CORS permissions for these methods:

checklist.bucketValid: Bucket name and region are valid
checklist.corsConfigured: CORS is configured for your origin

errors.sameNameError: New name is the same as the old name
errors.loadFailed: Failed to load profile. Please try again.
errors.cannotDeleteCurrent: Cannot delete the currently active profile.
errors.invalidFormat: Invalid profile format. Missing name or data.
errors.parseFailed: Failed to parse profile JSON. Please check the format.

s3Invalid.s3ConfigDesc: S3 settings are not valid or not configured, please check in the settings page.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.autoRefreshDesc: Refresh the gallery every time it loads. If enabled, there will be more List requests, which may slightly increase S3 costs.

sync.title: Profile Sync
sync.description: Sync your settings across devices using end to end encrypted cloud storage
sync.remoteUpdatedMessage: Remote has been updated since last sync on this device.
sync.remoteUpdatedDetails: Remote updated by other device at {time} from {browser} on {os}

toasts.noCorrespondingProfile: No corresponding profile found on the server
toasts.deleteFailed: Failed to delete remote sync data

errors.invalidInput: Invalid input when uploading local profile
errors.payloadTooLarge: Local profile is too large to upload
errors.conflict: Conflict when uploading local profile, might be uploading from other device at the same time. Please sync again
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests when uploading local profile. Try again in about {seconds} seconds.

enableDialog.title: Enable Profile Sync
enableDialog.description: Understand how sync works before enabling

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: Your profiles and settings are encrypted on your device before being sent to the server. The server stores only encrypted data and cannot read your information. Only devices with your sync token can decrypt and access your data.

tokenStorage.title: Token Storage
tokenStorage.description: Your sync token serves as both the authentication credential and encryption key. It will be stored in your browser's localStorage for automatic syncing across sessions.

security.title: Security Considerations
security.risk: Your token is stored in the browser and could potentially be accessed by malicious browser extensions or certain types of attacks.
security.acceptable: However, this risk is acceptable because your settings data is also stored in the browser. If someone can access your token, they could already read your unencrypted settings directly. The encryption primarily protects your data while it's on the server.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: Your synced data will be automatically deleted from the server if not accessed for {days} days. Each time you sync (read or write), the retention period resets.
dataRetention.descriptionForever: Your synced data will be stored on the server indefinitely until you manually delete it.

bestPractice.title: ðŸ’¡ Best Practice
bestPractice.description: Generate a unique token specifically for Image Port. Do not reuse tokens from other services to limit potential damage if the token is compromised.

pullDialog.title: Pull Remote Profiles
pullDialog.description: The current profiles on the remote server is newer than the local ones.
pullDialog.uploadedAt: The current settings on the remote server were uploaded at <time></time> from <browser></browser> on <os></os>.

conflictDialog.title: Sync Conflict Detected
conflictDialog.description: Both your local settings and remote settings have been modified. Please choose which version to keep.
conflictDialog.uploadedAt: The current settings on the remote server were uploaded at <time></time> from <browser></browser> on <os></os>.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Remote Sync Data
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete your remote sync data? This action cannot be undone.

tokenSetup.title: Setup Sync Token
tokenSetup.description: Your sync token is a BIP39 mnemonic phrase that encrypts your profiles. Keep it safe - you'll need it to sync across devices.

saveWarning.title: Save this token securely!
saveWarning.description: Store it in a password manager or write it down. You cannot recover it if lost, and you'll need it to sync on other devices.

tokenViewer.title: Sync Token
tokenViewer.description: Your sync token is used to encrypt and decrypt your profiles. Keep it safe and secure.

securityWarning.title: Keep your token secure!
securityWarning.description: Anyone with this token can decrypt your synced profiles. Store it safely in a password manager.

tokenViewer.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear your sync token? You'll need it to sync again on this device.

grid.includePathTip: You are only listing photos from path <mono>{path}</mono> since you have set an include path filter. This might be why no photos are found. If this is incorrect, please update it in the <link>S3 settings</link>.

filter.directoryTree: Find images like in a directory tree.
filter.clickToOpenCalendar: Click the button to open the calendar and select a date range.

sort.sortActiveMessage: Search is active, sort options are disabled. Photos will be sorted by search match.
sort.sortInactiveMessage: Choose how to sort the photos.
sort.name: Name (Path)
sort.sortOrderDesc: Show results in ascending or descending order.

renameModal.title: Rename Photo
renameModal.description: Enter a new name (key) for this photo. This will be the full path in your S3 bucket.

deleteModal.title: Delete Confirm
deleteModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

renameMessages.objectExists: An object with that name already exists. Choose a different name.
renameMessages.sameKey: New name is the same as the current name
renameMessages.partialSuccess: Photo copied but failed to delete original. Both versions exist.
